sentences.en: Class proper begins with a discussion on planetary orbits.
sentences.cn: 类妥善开始对行星轨道的讨论.

sentences.en: Finding planets orbiting Barnards Star would increase our confidence that planetary systems are common.
sentences.cn: 对环绕巴纳德里旋转的行星的发现将会增强我们认为行星系是普遍存在的信念.

sentences.en: It is reasonable to suppose that other stars are also attended by planetary system.
sentences.cn: 有理由猜测别的恒星也伴有行星系统.

sentences.en: Many objections can be raised to this picture of planetary nebula formation.
sentences.cn: 形成行星状星云的这一图象可能会引起许多异议.

sentences.en: New discoveries about Uranus excited planetary astronomers in 1977.
sentences.cn: 一九七七年对天王星的几项新发现振奋了行星天文学家.

sentences.en: No planetary influence shall reach us but and cherishes the sweetest flowers.
sentences.cn: 这儿无尘世的干扰,只甜蜜的花香欣赏.

sentences.en: OK, this is the Bohr model, Bohr model of the atom is planetary or nuclear.
sentences.cn: 好的，这就是波尔模型，波尔的原子模型是行星模型或者核心模型。

sentences.en: One question that has baffled planetary scientists is how oceans formed on the surface of terrestrial planets like Earth -- rocky planets made of silicate and metals.
sentences.cn: 一个困扰着行星科学家的问题是：海洋是怎样在像地球这样由硅酸盐和金属组成的石质行星的表面形成的？

sentences.en: Planetary nebulae are a type of isolated gaseous nebulae possessing a fair degree of bilateral symmetry.
sentences.cn: 行星状星云是一类孤立的气体星云,具有相当程度的双侧对称性.

sentences.en: Planetary nebulae fade away gradually over tens of thousands of years.
sentences.cn: 行星状星云在数万年间逐渐衰老.

sentences.en: Rather, we infer that planetary systems must be quite common.
sentences.cn: 相反, 我们的结论是行星系统的存在一定相当普遍.

sentences.en: The sciences of planetary geology have benefited tremendously from these new finds.
sentences.cn: 行星地质科学从这些新发现中受益匪浅.

sentences.en: The vibration performance of cycloid ball planetary reducer was analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析摆线钢球行星传动减速器的振动特性.

sentences.en: The whole field of planetary gear transmission is dealt - with.
sentences.cn: 里基本上涉及了渐开线行星齿轮传动的整个领域.

sentences.en: These bands must introduce longitudinal asymmetry in the planetary albedo.
sentences.cn: 这些云带必定引起行星反照率的经向不对称性.

sentences.en: These disks are the remnants of planetary formation.
sentences.cn: 这些圆盘是行星形成的剩余物质。

sentences.en: Travel to the planetary systems of other stars is a much more formidable undertaking.
sentences.cn: 要航行到其他恒星的行星系中去是件极难实现的事.

sentences.en: Within our own galaxy there are probably tens of thousands of planetary systems.
sentences.cn: 在我们自己的星系里可能有数以万计的行星系。

words.tran_cn: 星子的；星子组成的；小行星体的

phrases.tran_cn: 行星边界层；地表边界层

trans.tran_cn: 行星的，俗世的，现世的，流浪的，飘忽不定的，[机]行星齿轮的
trans.tran_en: Planetary means relating to or belonging to planets
